name: hermetically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that does not allow any air or other substance to leave or enter: They were quarantined for three weeks under hermetically sealed conditions. Companies resorted to hermetically sealed packaging.
formal in a way that involves little communication with people living outside a group or place: He has been on his Michigan farm for 25 years, living simply and hermetically. Thoreau scribbled hermetically in the Massachusetts woods. See
hermetic
More examplesFewer examplesMost of the bodies were then placed in hermetically sealed caskets. Some athletes have taken to living and sleeping in hermetically sealed tents or rooms that simulate high-altitude conditions.We cannot hermetically seal our borders.A cult of personality arises in a hermetically sealed environment, cut off from communication.
